name: Espresso
description: A full-flavored, concentrated form of coffee served in small, strong shots. It is the base for many other coffee drinks.

name: Americano
description: A coffee drink made by diluting an espresso with hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from, traditionally brewed coffee.

name: Latte
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk. It typically has a thin layer of foam on top.

name: Cappuccino
description: A coffee-based drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. Often topped with cinnamon or cocoa powder.

name: Macchiato
description: An espresso with a small amount of steamed milk and foam on top. The term 'macchiato' means 'stained' or 'spotted' in Italian.

name: Mocha
description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte, made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup or cocoa powder, often topped with whipped cream.

name: Flat White
description: A coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam (steamed milk with small, fine bubbles) and a velvety consistency.

name: Affogato
description: A coffee-based dessert made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Cortado
description: An espresso cut with a small amount of warm milk to reduce the acidity. The ratio of coffee to milk is generally 1:1.

name: Ristretto
description: A more concentrated version of an espresso, using the same amount of coffee but half the amount of water. It is stronger and more intense in flavor.

name: Doppio
description: A double shot of espresso, typically served in a demitasse cup. It is stronger than a single shot of espresso.

name: Lungo
description: A 'long' espresso made by using more water than usual. It results in a milder and less concentrated coffee.

name: Red Eye
description: A strong coffee drink made by adding a shot of espresso to a cup of regular brewed coffee.

name: Irish Coffee
description: A cocktail consisting of hot coffee, Irish whiskey, and sugar, stirred, and topped with cream.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: A traditional coffee preparation method where finely ground coffee beans are simmered in water (often with sugar) and served unfiltered, resulting in a strong and thick brew.
